access_token.helpText: Token you have generated that can be used to authorize access to the GitHub API. Keep this a secret because it can be used to gain unauthorized access to your repository and account. This app does not store the token, and only sends it to Github via an Authorization header.
access_token.label: Access Token

tag_name.helpText: Required. The name of the tag.
tag_name.label: Tag Name

target_commitish.helpText: Specifies the commitish value that determines where the Git tag is created from. Can be any branch or commit SHA. Unused if the Git tag already exists. Default: the repository"s default branch (usually master).
target_commitish.label: Target Commit Hash

body.helpText: Text describing the contents of the tag.
body.label: Release Message

draft.helpText: Check to create a draft (unpublished) release, uncheck to create a published one. Default: uncheck
draft.label: Draft

prerelease.helpText: Check to identify the release as a prerelease. uncheck to identify the release as a full release. Default: uncheck
prerelease.label: Pre-release
